content: about available sizes eight newborn to adult man pattern format written pattern no chart pattern language english skill level beginner & advanced beginner pdf format printer friendly version bonus video techniques knit flat back & forth knit & purl stitches clean edge advanced beginner materials yarn weight bulky yardage 11 - 77 yards 10 - 71 meters suggested yarn we are knitters petite wool needle size us 10 5 6 5mm knitting needles terms a physical product will not be shipped a knitting pattern is a set of instructions reselling rewriting or distributing the pattern itself is prohibited due to the fact that this is digital media refunds are not available if you re a knitter you re welcome to create products from my patterns to sell credit would be great if have any questions please contact me thank you so much jennifer bromefields com you can grab this pattern for free on my website
